column2:
swchl1_tibble %>% 
  left_join(sampling_tib_all, by=c("Year","Month")) %>% 
  unite(., remove = FALSE, "year_month", c("Year","Month")) %>% 
  filter(., Year_Group %in% years_to_filter) %>% 
  group_by(round_Lat,round_Lon,Year_Group) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(annual_chla = mean(mean_chla, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  separate(., Year_Group, into=c("y", "Year"))-> annual_chla
